moreBlocks.articles:
• Auto Accidents
    The effects of a car accident are far reaching. The attorneys at Bremer & Trollop understand the Wisconsin Rules of the Road and the complexities of motor vehicle accidents.
  • Workers'Comp
    When you are injured on the job, it is the responsibility of your employer to cover your medical expenses and lost wages. By law, all employers must cover expenses resulting from employees' injuries received while on the job.

description:
Located in Wausau, Wisconsin, the Bremer & Trollop Law Offices, S.C., provides unmatched counsel and support to clients across the region who have suffered serious injuries or lost loved ones due to others' negligence or wrongdoings. With five total law offices across the state, they have become one of their region's most prominent and successful personal injury law firms. This means that you can rely on them to help you obtain the favorable outcomes you seek and the justice you deserve for your legal challenges arising from any of the following:

  • Car and truck accidents
  • Motorcycle accidents
  • Dog bites and animal attacks
  • Slip-and-fall accidents
  • Farm accidents
  • Nursing home injuries
  • Asbestos, mesothelioma and toxic exposure
  • DePuy hip claims
  • Surgical mesh claims
  • Wrongful death
  • Workers' compensation

For almost 30 years now, Bremer & Trollop Law Offices, S.C., has served thousands of clients across Wisconsin during their most dire times of need. The firm's lawyers have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for their plaintiff clients, and you can count on them to fight aggressively to help you secure the maximum amount of compensation you need.

Honored for their outstanding professionalism and service, one of the firm's lawyers is AV Preeminent peer-review rated,* the highest rating, through Martindale-Hubbell, and the other has been named to The National Trial Lawyers: Top 40 under 40 list. They have also received many other accolades and endorsements from their peers along with numerous testimonials and referrals from their satisfied clients.

To begin the process for yourself or a beloved family member, you can contact Bremer & Trollop Law Offices, S.C., to schedule a free initial consultation. The firm also currently offers virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you safe and healthy.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer-review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingsTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
